ca.utoronto.msrg.padres.common.comm.socket
Class SocketMessageSender 

java.lang.Object
  ca.utoronto.msrg.padres.common.comm.MessageSender
      ca.utoronto.msrg.padres.common.comm.socket.SocketMessageSender
Direct Known Subclasses:
AsyncSocketMessageSender 
public class SocketMessageSender
				
extends MessageSender

Initiates connections, and is responsible for sending all messages for both Brokers and Clients.

Author:
Alex

public SocketMessageSender(SocketAddress remoteAddress)
Constructor. Connect to specified URL. Never called from within the comm. layer.

Parameters:
remoteAddress - The URI of the remote broker's connection listener
Throws:
CommunicationException

SocketMessageSender

public SocketMessageSender(SocketPipe socketPipe)
This constructor is only called when dynamically creating a server's MessageSender. Therefore, it is only called on the side of a client.

Parameters:
socket - Socket being used by the SocketClientConnection object. (will be shared)
oos - ObjectOutputStream being used by the SocketClientConnection object. (will be shared)
ois - ObjectInputStream being used by the SocketClientConnection object. (will be shared)

messageIDReceived

public void messageIDReceived(String messageId)
Method invoked once the SocketClientConnection on a client side has received a messageId for a message that was just sent by this client. Method records the messageId in this object, and notifies the waiting thread to recommence.

Parameters:
messageId - the new messageId, as received by the socketClientConnection.
